translation.zh: 我妈妈病倒了 我打电话求救

translation.en: But it took too long to arrive, because it was a weekend.
translation.zh: 但是等待时间太长了 因为是周末

translation.en: It was Carnival. The streets were closed…
translation.zh: 那时是嘉年华街道关闭了

translation.en: and the rescue took too long.
translation.zh: 而且救援队拖太久才来

translation.en: I'm not saying that my mother died because of the delay in the assistance,
translation.zh: 我不是说我妈妈因为援助延误而去世

translation.en: but there's a possibility that she wouldn't have died.
translation.zh: 但她有可能可以活下来

translation.en: It was very complicated. It still affects me a lot.
translation.zh: 这很复杂 它对我影响仍然很大

translation.en: And I don't want others to lose their loved ones.
translation.zh: 而我不希望其他人失去他们的爱人

translation.en: It's difficult. It's complicated.
translation.zh: 是不容易的 是复杂的

translation.en: This is one reason why I'm doing what I'm doing today.
translation.zh: 这就是如今我做这事的原因之一

translation.en: -[in English] How are you, my dear? -I'm not good. I'm just--
translation.zh: 你还好吗 亲爱的？ 不好 我…

translation.en: I couldn't sleep.
translation.zh: 我不能睡

translation.en: So, what did your son say to you when he called you earlier?
translation.zh: 你儿子之前打电话给你时说了什么？

translation.en: He's upset.
translation.zh: 他很难过

translation.en: [Hassan] Upset?
translation.zh: 难过？

translation.en: Yeah, very upset.
translation.zh: 是的 非常难过

translation.en: [Hassan] Of course. He wants to see his mum.
translation.zh: 当然 他想见他的妈妈

translation.en: Well, I want to see him, too, but I don't know when I'll go home.
translation.zh: 我也想见他但不知道什么时候可以回家

translation.en: [Hassan] I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: [patient] I don't know if I'll go home.
translation.zh: 我不知道我是否能够回家

translation.en: [in Arabic] Hello, how are you?
translation.zh: 嗨 你好吗？

translation.en: Hello.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: All good, how about you?
translation.zh: 很好 你呢？

translation.en: Thank God, all good. We're fine. How are you doing?
translation.zh: 感谢神 一切都好我们很好 你好吗？

translation.en: We're fine.
translation.zh: 我们很好

translation.en: What are you up to?
translation.zh: 你在做什么？

translation.en: Your mother is making Fatteh.
translation.zh: 你妈妈正在制作法特

translation.en: Oh, how I crave Fatteh!
translation.zh: 好想吃法特！

translation.en: It's easy to make.
translation.zh: 这很容易做

translation.en: I made Makloubeh yesterday. It was delicious.
translation.zh: 我昨天做了马克卢贝 很美味

translation.en: -I hope you enjoyed it. Was it good? -Yes, it was good.
translation.zh: -希望你吃得开心 好吃吗？-是的 很好吃

translation.en: I'm glad you enjoyed it.
translation.zh: 很高兴你吃得开心

translation.en: Farah kept eating until she fell on her face.
translation.zh: 法拉一直吃到直到她倒在地上

translation.en: The rice wasn't very fatty. I hoped it would be greasier.
translation.zh: 米饭不是很肥 我希望它会更油腻

translation.en: It needs ghee.
translation.zh: 要用酥油

translation.en: Where's mom? Let me talk to her for a bit.
translation.zh: 妈呢？让我和她聊一下

translation.en: -Hello, darling! -How are you?
translation.zh: -嗨 亲爱的！-你好吗？

translation.en: Bon appetit.
translation.zh: 祝用餐愉快

translation.en: I miss you.
translation.zh: 我想念你

translation.en: I miss you too.
translation.zh: 我也想念你

translation.en: What's up?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: -All good. -Thank God, everything is good.
translation.zh: -很好-感谢神 一切都好

translation.en: God bless you.
translation.zh: 上帝保佑你

translation.en: May God bless you.
translation.zh: 愿上帝保佑你

translation.en: Darling. How are you?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你好吗？

translation.en: Not much new. Everyone is working today.
translation.zh: 没什么新消息 今天大家都在工作

translation.en: Your sister invited us round. We made Qatayef to take over.
translation.zh: 你姐姐这次邀请我们过去我们做了卡塔耶夫带过去

translation.en: We're going to her place now.
translation.zh: 现在我们要过去她家了

translation.en: Okay, go eat. I won't take up your time.
translation.zh: 好 去吃吧 我不会耽误你的时间

translation.en: -Okay, darling. I will call you. -Okay, darling.
translation.zh: -好 亲爱的 我会打给你-好 亲爱的

translation.en: -Goodbye. -Goodbye.
translation.zh: -再见-再见

translation.en: -Goodbye, Son. -Goodbye, Dad.
translation.zh: -再见 儿子-再见 爸爸

translation.en: [woman] Hi, we're here out on the 11th Street overpass
translation.zh: 嗨 我们在第11街立交桥上

translation.en: where the City of Miami is breaking down tents.
translation.zh: 迈阿密市政局正在这里拆除帐篷

translation.en: I want to make it clear that CDC guidelines at this time,
translation.zh: 我想澄清此时疾病控制中心的指导方针

translation.en: indicate that for Public Health measures,
translation.zh: 表明对于公共卫生措施

translation.en: encampments should not be disturbed.
translation.zh: 营地不应受到干扰

translation.en: Hey. We got reports that they were breaking down people's tents here?
translation.zh: 嘿 我们收到报告说他们正在拆毁人们的帐篷？

translation.en: -We're gonna have tents tomorrow. -Okay. He needs one.
translation.zh: -我们明天就会有帐篷了-好 他需要一个

translation.en: Yeah, if you want to talk at the press conference--
translation.zh: 是 如果你想在新闻发布会上发言…

translation.en: -I want to. -Yeah. Okay. All right.
translation.zh: -我要-好的

translation.en: -What's your name? -Keith Williams.
translation.zh: -你叫什么名字？-基思威廉姆斯

translation.en: All right, do you want to do a video now?
translation.zh: 好 现在你想拍个视频吗？

translation.en: -That we could post on social media? -If you want to.
translation.zh: -让我们放上社交媒体？-你要的话

translation.en: Okay. So you just tell us what happened and--
translation.zh: 好 你就告诉我们发生什么事 然后…

translation.en: They put us in a shelter.
translation.zh: 他们把我们安置在避难所

translation.en: -Which happened ten, twenty times. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -这发生了十多 二十次了-是

translation.en: -There's no help. -Okay…
translation.zh: -根本没有援助-好…

translation.en: [Dr. Henderson] The same individuals that I meet and I see on the streets,
translation.zh: 我在街上遇到和看到的那些人

translation.en: I see my dad, I see my brother.
translation.zh: 就好像看见我爸爸 我哥哥

translation.en: My dad definitely spent the majority of the years
translation.zh: 和我妈妈分手后 我爸爸

translation.en: after my mom broke up in unstable housing,
translation.zh: 肯定在不稳定的住处中度过了大部分时间

translation.en: and my brother, the same thing.
translation.zh: 还有我哥哥 也是一样

translation.en: You okay? Did they say you had a concussion or something?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？他们有没有说你有脑震荡之类的？

translation.en: -How is it doing? -It's alright.
translation.zh: -怎么样了？-不错

translation.en: -You want me to take a look at it? -Well…
translation.zh: -要我帮忙看吗？-唔…

translation.en: Let me see.
translation.zh: 让我看看

translation.en: Oh, wow, what did they hit you with?
translation.zh: 哇 他们用什么打你？

translation.en: It looks to be healing okay, actually.
translation.zh: 其实看起来正在愈合

translation.en: -When's the last time you took a shower? -Day before yesterday.
translation.zh: -你最后一次沐浴是什么时候？-前天

translation.en: Why don't you come by so we can change the bandage?
translation.zh: 不然你过来让我们换绷带？

translation.en: -You got clothes? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -你有衣服吗？-有的

translation.en: That's what I'm saying. Can you come today?
translation.zh: 这就是我要说的 你今天能来吗？

translation.en: Can you make sure he gets down there? I want him to get down there.
translation.zh: 你能确定他会来吗？

translation.en: [Dr. Henderson] COVID-19 exacerbated all the bad things about… America.
translation.zh: 新冠肺炎加剧了所有关于美国的丑事

translation.en: Are you okay? You sure?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？你肯定？

translation.en: I don't think we could have imagined that we'd be here like this today.
translation.zh: 我想我们无法想象我们今天会走到这一步

translation.en: Did they tell you about the hurricane coming?
translation.zh: 他们有没有告诉你飓风来了？

translation.en: You didn't even know.
translation.zh: 你不会知道

translation.en: [Dr. Henderson] With what's going on in crisis and the economic downturn that we had,
translation.zh: 随着危机中发生的事和我们所经历的经济衰退

translation.en: and the way that affects the Black and Brown communities,
translation.zh: 以及对黑和棕色人种社区的影响

translation.en: you could be next.
translation.zh: 下一个可能就是你

translation.en: "What if I lose my house?" There's always some sort of nagging…
translation.zh: “万一我失去我的住所呢？”总有一些唠叨…

translation.en: questions in the back of my mind.
translation.zh: 我脑子里总有问题

translation.en: I want to make sure I don't end up in the same situation, but also…
translation.zh: 我想确保我不会陷入同样的境地但同时…

translation.en: if I do, I want to make sure that I'm prepared for whatever is to come.
translation.zh: 如果我遇上了 我想确保我为即将到来的一切做好准备

translation.en: [Mohit in Hindi] Where are your COVID patients?
translation.zh: 你的新冠肺炎病人呢？

translation.en: On the seventh?
translation.zh: 在七楼？

translation.en: The labor room is also on the seventh floor?
translation.zh: 待产室也在七楼？

translation.en: -[woman] No, it's on the fifth. -Fifth floor.
translation.zh: -不 是在五楼-五楼

translation.en: -[Mohit] You want to sit? -[Nupur] Distancing?
translation.zh: 你想坐下？ 保持距离？

translation.en: [Nupur] I'm getting breathless.
translation.zh: 我快喘不过气来了

translation.en: [doctor] Don't worry. Be comfortable.
translation.zh: 别担心 放轻松

translation.en: Relax. Height, weight and…
translation.zh: 放轻松 身高 体重还有…

translation.en: [Nupur] I'm having palpitations.
translation.zh: 我有心悸

translation.en: [Mohit] Do you see any clotting or not?
translation.zh: 你是否看到任何凝血块？

translation.en: [doctor] See, right now there is no clot inside.
translation.zh: 看 现在里面没有凝块

translation.en: Placenta is absolutely fine and
translation.zh: 胎盘绝对没问题 而且

translation.en: that clot must have been resolved by now.
translation.zh: 那血块现在肯定已分解了

translation.en: [Nupur] Since last week, I've been feeling a little slower.
translation.zh: 从上周开始 我感觉有点慢了

translation.en: [doctor] A little bit of concern is growth.
translation.zh: 有点要关注的是增长

translation.en: You are lagging behind by one week and three days.
translation.zh: 你落后了一周零三天

translation.en: So, growth is… Basically, we have a little bit of a concern.
translation.zh: 所以 增长是…基本上 我们有点担心

translation.en: MORGUE
translation.zh: （太平间）

translation.en: [man in Spanish] I never thought it would happen to my father.
translation.zh: 我从没想过这会发生在我父亲身上

translation.en: This disease took my father's life.
translation.zh: 这场病夺去了我父亲的生命

translation.en: [crying] He'll become an angel for me and my family.
translation.zh: 他会成为我和我家人的天使

translation.en: Everyone, please look after yourselves. Truly, be cautious.
translation.zh: 大家请照顾好自己 真的 要谨慎

translation.en: Arévalo needs to be intubated.
translation.zh: 阿雷瓦洛需要插管

translation.en: -[nurse] Who? -Arévalo.
translation.zh: -谁？-阿雷瓦洛

translation.en: -We need to inform them. -[Dr. Lopez] I did it already.
translation.zh: -我们必须通知他们-我已经通知了

translation.en: Dr. Ceci, I wanted to consult with you about a delicate topic,
translation.zh: 塞西医生我想和你商量一件伤脑筋的事

translation.en: more of a human concern rather than something technical.
translation.zh: 比较是人道问题 不是技术问题

translation.en: My colleague Dr. Vázquez…
translation.zh: 我的同事巴斯克斯医生…

translation.en: it's been brutal, so brutal.
translation.zh: 太惨了 真的很惨

translation.en: He's dying.
translation.zh: 他快死了

translation.en: And we want to give his family the opportunity to see him,
translation.zh: 我们想给他家人机会见他

translation.en: at least to see him from a distance.
translation.zh: 至少在远距离看他

translation.en: It's so painful. He's one of us.
translation.zh: 真的太痛苦了 他是我们一员

translation.en: So young, 43 years old.
translation.zh: 很年轻 43岁

translation.en: [in English] Albert was like… "Patient number 18 is gone," and I--
translation.zh: 阿尔伯特就说…“18号病人走了”然后我…

translation.en: I said, "Oh, gone! I wasn't--"
translation.zh: 我说“走了！我还没…”

translation.en: I was happy because she was really struggling, and I said,
translation.zh: 我很高兴 因为她真的很挣扎 我说

translation.en: "I'm glad that she went home."
translation.zh: “我很高兴她回家了”

translation.en: He's like, "No, Hassan, you should know now
translation.zh: 他说“不 哈桑 如今你该知道

translation.en: that when we say 'gone,' it means gone."
translation.zh: 当我们说‘走了’就表示死了”

translation.en: So, I had to walk in to get the rubbish trolley back into the room.
translation.zh: 所以 我不得不走进去把垃圾车送回房

translation.en: And… you can tell when someone is dead,
translation.zh: 还有…你可以知道什么时候有人死了

translation.en: because they close the curtains around them…
translation.zh: 因为他们关上周围的窗帘…

translation.en: and I could hear the…
translation.zh: 然后我可以听到…

translation.en: I could hear the…
translation.zh: 我可以听到

translation.en: the plastic being wrapped around her by the nurses.
translation.zh: 护士用塑料包着她

translation.en: She's died. She's dead.
translation.zh: 她已经死了

translation.en: [Hassan] I could see the signs, I could see the symptoms of a crisis.
translation.zh: 我可以看到迹象和危机的征兆

translation.en: We were not ready for it.
translation.zh: 我们还没有准备好

translation.en: Because we have invested our time and energy to fight one another.
translation.zh: 因为我们已投入了时间和精力来互相争斗

translation.en: I have a phobia from hospitals. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我有医院恐惧症

translation.en: I hate-- I mean--
translation.zh: 我讨厌…我是说…

translation.en: Basically, I was tortured in a prison. I was in 215.
translation.zh: 基本上 我在监狱里被虐待当时我在215

translation.en: 215 is military intelligence.
translation.zh: 215是军事情报

translation.en: It's one of the most notorious secret police stations in Syria.
translation.zh: 它是叙利亚最臭名昭著的秘密警察局之一

translation.en: And after three days of being there, my arms got really swollen because of--
translation.zh: 在那里待了三天后我的胳膊肿得厉害 因为…

translation.en: because both of my wrists were smashed and this was broken here.
translation.zh: 因为我的两个手腕都被砸碎了这个在这里断了

translation.en: My arm was broken in another-- Right here.
translation.zh: 我的手臂另一边断了…这里

translation.en: And my left leg suffered a lot because of--
translation.zh: 我的左腿受了很多伤 因为…

translation.en: I got electrocuted and beaten up, so it got really swollen,
translation.zh: 我被电击和殴打 所以它肿了

translation.en: and it became very dark, very-- Like, it was black.
translation.zh: 它变得很黑 是黑色的

translation.en: So after three days, they figured they should take me to the hospital.
translation.zh: 三天后 他们认为应该带我去医院

translation.en: So they put a bin bag over my head and they taped the bin bag,
translation.zh: 他们把一个袋子套在我头上并用胶带粘住袋子

translation.en: and then they put me in a car, but because I know Damascus by the--
translation.zh: 然后他们把我放在车里但因为我知道大马士革…

translation.en: I know Damascus very well, so I knew where I was.
translation.zh: 我对大马士革了如指掌所以我知道自己在哪里

translation.en: I knew where they took me. They took me to… the military hospital.
translation.zh: 我知道他们带我去哪里他们带我去了军人医院

translation.en: And when I was there, as soon as they walked me in,
translation.zh: 他们一带我进去

translation.en: I was being slapped and punched from everywhere
translation.zh: 我就受到来自四面八方的刮掌和拳打

translation.en: from the clinical staff as well, because, obviously, I'm a protester.
translation.zh: 医疗人员也一样打我因为 显然 我是一名抗议者

translation.en: So, I'm… one of the bad guys.
translation.zh: 所以 我是…其中一个坏人

translation.en: They took me outside, put me in another room.
translation.zh: 他们带我到外面 放我在另一个房间

translation.en: I was in so much pain, and I said,
translation.zh: 我非常痛苦 我说了

translation.en: "Please look at my left leg. Like, just check it out."
translation.zh: “请看看我的左腿 只要检查一下”

translation.en: And they had a glance and then they said--
translation.zh: 他们看了一眼说…

translation.en: That's exactly what he said, the nurse.
translation.zh: 这正是他所说的 那个护士

translation.en: He said, "Oh…" [tutting]
translation.zh: 他说“噢…

translation.en: "Abu Ali, get the amputation tools."
translation.zh: 阿布阿里 去拿截肢工具”

translation.en: I used to run marathons back then, so, I didn't-- [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我以前经常跑马拉松所以 我不要…

translation.en: Like, I didn't want to lose my leg.
translation.zh: 我不想失去我的腿

translation.en: So, I got--
translation.zh: 所以 我…

translation.en: At that point, I started moving very frantically.
translation.zh: 在那时候 我开始非常疯狂地移动

translation.en: And I said… [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我说…

translation.en: "Let's just think about this before you amputate anything."
translation.zh: “在你截肢之前 再考虑清楚

translation.en: "Let's just have a chat, please."
translation.zh: 我们谈谈 求求你”

translation.en: I just wanted to have a chat with everyone. [laughing, crying]
translation.zh: 我只想和大家谈谈

translation.en: [sniffles] And then, after five minutes of me crying
translation.zh: 然后 在我哭了五分钟之后

translation.en: and pleading for them not to chop off my leg they…
translation.zh: 并恳求他们不要砍断我的腿…

translation.en: They said, "Oh, we're joking with you."
translation.zh: 他们说“噢 我们跟你开玩笑”

translation.en: And they gave me some antibiotics.
translation.zh: 他们给了我一些抗生素

translation.en: But after I was released, the doctor who operated on my leg he said,
translation.zh: 我被释放后 给我腿动手术的医生说

translation.en: "If you stayed one another week you would have lost your leg."
translation.zh: “如果你再待多一个星期你会失去你的腿”

translation.en: So, yeah. [laughs] I hate hospitals.
translation.zh: 所以 就这样 我讨厌医院

translation.en: [man in Spanish] They say that he passed away.
translation.zh: 他们说他去世了

translation.en: Wow, when?
translation.zh: 哇 什么时候？

translation.en: The issue is covering his shift.
translation.zh: 问题是怎么排他的班次

translation.en: And tomorrow there is another doctor absent.
translation.zh: 明天还有另一位医生缺席

translation.en: Nino, because he's ill.
translation.zh: 尼诺 因为他病了

translation.en: Please, Doctor, do me a favor. I'm at COVID right now.
translation.zh: 求求你 医生 帮我一个忙现在我在新冠肺炎区

translation.en: Could you please call Belén to find a way to replace them?
translation.zh: 你能打电话给贝伦想办法替代他们吗？

translation.en: Otherwise you won't have staff tomorrow.
translation.zh: 否则明天你就没有医护人员了

translation.en: Doctor. Doctor.
translation.zh: 医生

translation.en: Doctor. Another doctor over there.
translation.zh: 医生 另一个医生在那边

translation.en: In total here, there are seven doctors intubated.
translation.zh: 这里总共有七名医生插管了

translation.en: This shit is going to get us all.
translation.zh: 这坏东西迟早会害死大家

translation.en: -[in Portuguese] What's this alley called? -Tavares Alley.
translation.zh: 这条巷子叫什么？ -塔瓦雷斯巷-好

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: -塔瓦雷斯巷-好

translation.en: -[man] Do you have asthmatic bronchitis? -[woman] I do.
translation.zh: -你有哮喘性支气管炎吗？-是的

translation.en: -[man] Do you use an inhaler? -[woman] No.
translation.zh: -你有用吸入器吗？-没有

translation.en: [man] What do use when you have an attack?
translation.zh: 你哮喘发作时会用什么？

translation.en: My mom said she'd buy an inhaler, but she can't afford one.
translation.zh: 我妈妈说她会买一个吸入器但她买不起

translation.en: [Renata] My worry is not when this pandemic will end…
translation.zh: 我担心的不是这种流行病何时会结束

translation.en: but when will all the other pandemics end?
translation.zh: 而是其他大流行病何时会结束？

translation.en: [in English] Right now, I'm in Overtown.
translation.zh: 现在 我在欧弗敦

translation.en: The tropical storm has been upgraded to a hurricane.
translation.zh: 热带风暴已升级为飓风

translation.en: There are tornado warnings.
translation.zh: 已有龙卷风警告

translation.en: The City of Miami or the county,
translation.zh: 迈阿密市或县

translation.en: as I've been told by individuals, no one came to offer them shelter.
translation.zh: 正如一些人告诉我没有人给他们提供庇护

translation.en: No one offered them a temporary place to stay or an evacuation route.
translation.zh: 没人为他们提供临时住所或疏散路线

translation.en: [in Spanish] I have kids. I'm exposing myself to the virus.
translation.zh: 我有孩子 我让自己暴露在病毒之下

translation.en: When I spoke to the security,
translation.zh: 当我和保安谈话时

translation.en: he said that we all have the virus, and are going to die.
translation.zh: 他说我们都有病毒 并且要死了

translation.en: That's their security person.
translation.zh: 那是他们的保安人员

translation.en: Mamá.
translation.zh: 妈妈

translation.en: [Dr. Lopez in Spanish] I have a headache,
translation.zh: 我头痛

translation.en: my throat hurts, and I have a fever.
translation.zh: 我的喉咙很痛 我还发烧

translation.en: I'm scared.
translation.zh: 我很害怕

translation.en: [man on TV in English] Each death serves as a reminder
translation.zh: 每一次死亡都提醒我们的决心要坚定

translation.en: that we must stand firm in our resolve.
translation.zh: 每一次死亡都提醒我们的决心要坚定 （冠状病毒：唐宁街简报）

translation.en: Sadly, these deaths figures include NHS colleagues
translation.zh: （冠状病毒：唐宁街简报） 可悲的是 这些死亡数字包括国民保健署的同事

translation.en: and colleagues who work in social care.
translation.zh: 和从事社会关怀工作的同事

translation.en: They dedicated their lives to caring for others.
translation.zh: 他们奉献一生来关心他人

translation.en: Today, I'm able to announce
translation.zh: 今天 我可以宣布

translation.en: that the government is setting up a life assurance scheme
translation.zh: 政府正在设立一个人寿保险计划

translation.en: for NHS and social care frontline colleagues.
translation.zh: 给国民保健署和社会关怀前线同事

translation.en: We want to do everything that we can
translation.zh: 我们想尽我们所能

translation.en: to support families who are dealing with this grief.
translation.zh: 支持正在悲痛中的家庭

translation.en: [Hassan] So, the government, they said that NHS staff,
translation.zh: 所以 政府说国民健保署医护人员

translation.en: if they die, their family will be given indefinite leave to remain.
translation.zh: 如果去世了他们的家人将获得无限期居留许可

translation.en: -They will be given indefinite stay-- -Invulnerabilities.
translation.zh: -他们将获得无限期居留许可…-不会受伤害

translation.en: Except cleaners and porters…
translation.zh: 除了清洁工和搬运工

translation.en: and ward hosts and social care workers.
translation.zh: 以及病房服务员和社会关怀工作者

translation.en: So, essentially, if a migrant worker dies fighting the pandemic,
translation.zh: 所以 基本上如果一个移民员工死于抗击疫情

translation.en: their families get nothing. They could also be at risk of deportation.
translation.zh: 他们的家人将一无所获他们可能会面临被驱逐出境的风险

translation.en: And we're not talking about one or two people here,
translation.zh: 我们不是在谈论一两个人

translation.en: we're talking about thousands, if not tens of thousands of people,
translation.zh: 这是数千人 甚至是数万人

translation.en: the bedrock of the NHS.
translation.zh: 国民保健署的基石

translation.en: And I'm genuinely struggling to see how this is fair.
translation.zh: 我真的很想知道这有多么公平

translation.en: -It's not fair -It's not nice.
translation.zh: 这不好

translation.en: It's unfair that doctors and nurses are treated differently.
translation.zh: 医生和护士被区别对待是不公平的

translation.en: And we do the same thing.
translation.zh: 而且我们做的是同样的事

translation.en: Without porters, they can't operate.
translation.zh: 没有搬运工 他们就无法操作

translation.en: If you don't clean here, you would smell it.
translation.zh: 如果你不清理这里 你会闻到的

translation.en: We are closer… to the disease than the doctors and everybody,
translation.zh: 我们比医生和每个人更接近…疾病

translation.en: because we are cleaning the bed, we are cleaning the whole--
translation.zh: 因为我们会打扫床 清理整个…

translation.en: the disease the patients have.
translation.zh: 病人带着的疾病

translation.en: It's so sad, because they don't care about us.
translation.zh: 病人带着的疾病 太可悲了 因为他们不理我们

translation.en: We are the low-key workers.
translation.zh: 我们是低调的员工

translation.en: They don't care about us, it's not fair.
translation.zh: 他们不理我们 真的不公平

translation.en: [Renata in Portuguese] To the government, we don't exist.
translation.zh: 对政府来说 我们不存在

translation.en: We are cheap labor, that's all.
translation.zh: 我们是廉价劳工 仅此而已

translation.en: [male reporter] Brazil has recorded the highest number of deaths
translation.zh: 巴西创下历史新高在24小时以内

translation.en: from coronavirus in a 24-hour period.
translation.zh: 死于新冠肺炎的死亡人数

translation.en: Total cases are now at almost half a million.
translation.zh: 现在总病例接近五十万

translation.en: [Renata] The pandemic is not the problem.
translation.zh: 疫情不是问题

translation.en: The pandemic was just another factor
translation.zh: 疫情只是增加了边缘人群

translation.en: that added to what the people on the margins already have to live with.
translation.zh: 已无法忍受之生活的另一个因素

translation.en: [woman on the phone] I was hospitalized, so was my husband.
translation.zh: 我和我丈夫都进院了

translation.en: I went back home, but unfortunately my husband didn't have the same chance
translation.zh: 我回家了 可惜我丈夫没有同样机会

translation.en: and ended up passing away.
translation.zh: 最终去世了

translation.en: It's been very difficult for me.
translation.zh: 这对我来说非常困难

translation.en: Close ones are losing the battle.
translation.zh: 亲密的人正输掉这场战斗

translation.en: [Renata] We are not angry. We are outraged.
translation.zh: 我们不生气 我们很愤怒

translation.en: -[woman in English] Check his right-- -[man 1] No, check his pulse.
translation.zh: -检查他的右…-不 检查他的脉搏

translation.en: -[man 2] Get back on the sidewalk. -[man 1] The man ain't moved yet.
translation.zh: -回到人行道上-那人还没动

translation.en: -[man 1] Is he breathing right now? -[woman] He's handcuffed. He's not moving!
translation.zh: -他现在还有呼吸吗？-他戴着手铐！他不动了！

translation.en: [female reporter] Hundreds are flooding onto the streets of Minneapolis tonight
translation.zh: 今晚数百人涌上明尼阿波利斯街头

translation.en: following the release of a video showing an officer
translation.zh: 随着之前发布的一个视频显示一名警官

translation.en: kneeling on George Floyd's neck during his arrest.
translation.zh: 在乔治弗洛伊德被捕期间跪在他的脖子上

translation.en: It's been going through my head over and over again,
translation.zh: 它一遍又一遍地在我脑海中闪过

translation.en: and I keep asking myself, what can I do? Because I know that I've got to do something.
translation.zh: 我不断问自己 我能做什么？我得做点什么

translation.en: A man lost his life in Minnesota.
translation.zh: 一名男子在明尼苏达州丧生

translation.en: Somebody stood on his neck for eight minutes.
translation.zh: 有人在他的脖子上站了八分钟

translation.en: Eight minutes!
translation.zh: 八分钟！

translation.en: [man in Portuguese] Raise your right fist.
translation.zh: 举起你的右拳

translation.en: -Say, "I am… from the hood!" -[crowd] I am…
translation.zh: -说“我…来自贫民区！”-我…

translation.en: I am… favela!
translation.zh: 我是…贫民窟！

translation.en: -I am… favela! I am… more! More! -I am… more!
translation.zh: -我是…贫民窟！我是…更好的！-我是…更好的！

translation.en: More! More than a winner!
translation.zh: 更好的！不止是赢家！

translation.en: [man in English] I believe that we will win! [all] I believe that we will win! I believe that we will win!
translation.zh: 我相信我们会赢的！

translation.en: [in Portuguese] They talk so much about sanitation, cleaning and hand hygiene.
translation.zh: 他们谈论了很多关于卫生 清洁和手部卫生的话题

translation.en: But we still have our water turned off every night.
translation.zh: 但是每天晚上我们的水供仍然被关掉

translation.en: There are places in the community that don't have water after 8:00 p.m.,
translation.zh: 社区里有些地方晚上8:00后没有水

translation.en: and it's only back the next morning at 6:00 a.m.
translation.zh: 然后第二天早上6:00才恢复水供

translation.en: How can the virus not proliferate in this situation?
translation.zh: 在这种情况下 病毒怎可能不扩散？

translation.en: [in English] COVID-19 is killing people.
translation.zh: 新冠肺炎造成死亡

translation.en: It's killing Black people more than it's killing other people.
translation.zh: 它杀死的黑人比其他人种更多

translation.en: Other things are killing Black people too.
translation.zh: 其他的东西也在杀死黑人

translation.en: Police officers are killing Black people.
translation.zh: 警察正在杀害黑人

translation.en: The health care system is killing Black people.
translation.zh: 医疗保健系统正在杀害黑人

translation.en: -Black Lives! -[all] Matter!
translation.zh: -黑人性命！-攸关！

translation.en: -Black Lives! -[all] Matter!
translation.zh: -黑人性命！-攸关！

translation.en: Black Lives!
translation.zh: 黑人性命！

translation.en: For months we've been catering
translation.zh: 几个月来我们一直在提供餐饮服务

translation.en: to the most vulnerable population in Miami-Dade County.
translation.zh: 给迈阿密戴德县最弱势的群体

translation.en: [man] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是 先生

translation.en: And while I was doing that I got arrested.
translation.zh: 当我那样做时 我被捕了

translation.en: Let me tell you what happened after that.
translation.zh: 让我告诉你发生什么事

translation.en: We found out that the officer that racially profiled me,
translation.zh: 我们发现那个对我种族歧视

translation.en: that arrested me, had 12 use of force complaints.
translation.zh: 逮捕我的警官有12项使用武力的投诉

translation.en: He has six civilian complaints.
translation.zh: 他有六项民事投诉

translation.en: Who the fuck is holding them accountable?
translation.zh: 谁来追究他们的责任？

translation.en: -[crowd] Nobody! -Nobody!
translation.zh: -没有人！-没有人！

translation.en: We gotta hold them accountable.
translation.zh: 我们必须追究他们的责任

translation.en: It's our job to hold them accountable. How can we hold them accountable?
translation.zh: 追究他们的责任是我们要做的事我们该如何做到？

translation.en: We gotta elect a whole new people in our justice system.
translation.zh: 我们必须在原有的司法系统中选出全新的人

translation.en: -Black lives! -[all] Matter!
translation.zh: -黑人性命！-攸关！

translation.en: [all in Portuguese] One, two, three, four, five… a thousand!
translation.zh: 一 二 三… （超过一千三百万被遗忘的贫民窟）

translation.en: We are the G10 of favelas in Brazil.
translation.zh: 我们是巴西贫民窟的十国集团

translation.en: [man] We're having a peaceful demonstration.
translation.zh: 我们正在进行和平示威

translation.en: Indeed, and I thank you for your efforts.
translation.zh: 确实 我感谢你的付出

translation.en: -We have the right to go further. -My superiors said it's not possible.
translation.zh: -我们有权走得更远-我的上级说不可能

translation.en: We want to speak with the governor. He's obligated to see us.
translation.zh: 我们想和州长谈谈 他有义务见我们

translation.en: Listen, you will not go through.
translation.zh: 听好 你不能通过的

translation.en: Hold on. Stop here.
translation.zh: 等等 在这里停

translation.en: -So, when we said we see you! -[all] So, when we said we see you!
translation.zh: -当我们说要见你！-当我们说要见你！

translation.en: -We see you! -[all] We see you!
translation.zh: -我们就要见你！-我们就要见你！

translation.en: [man in Portuguese] We got our response.
translation.zh: 我们得到了回应

translation.en: The governor is too busy and won't be able to speak with us!
translation.zh: 州长太忙了 无法和我们说话！

translation.en: [in English] Hello, Mr. Prime Minister.
translation.zh: 你好 总理先生

translation.en: My name's Hassan Akkad and I am proudly working as a cleaner
translation.zh: 我的名字是哈桑阿卡德我以清洁工的身份自豪

translation.en: in a hospital ten miles away from the hospital which you were in.
translation.zh: 就在离你所在医院十六公里外的医院里工作

translation.en: I joined around the same time, actually,
translation.zh: 我大约在同一时间加入 实际上

translation.en: because I wanted to help this nation overcome this pandemic.
translation.zh: 因为我想帮助这个国家战胜这次疫情

translation.en: Today, however, I felt betrayed, stabbed in the back.
translation.zh: 然而 今天我感到被出卖了 被背叛了

translation.en: I felt shocked to find out that you've decided,
translation.zh: 我很震惊地发现你已经决定了

translation.en: your government decided, to exclude myself, and my colleagues,
translation.zh: 你的政府决定了要排除我和我的同事在外

translation.en: who work as cleaners and porters and social care workers who are…
translation.zh: 我们是清洁工 搬运工人以及社会关怀工作者…

translation.en: We are all on minimum wage.
translation.zh: 我们都领着最低工资

translation.en: You've decided to exclude us from the bereavement scheme.
translation.zh: 你决定将我们排除在丧亲计划之外

translation.en: So, if I die fighting coronavirus, my partner isn't allowed--
translation.zh: 如果我死于与冠状病毒的战斗我的配偶无法得到…

translation.en: isn't allowed an indefinite leave to remain.
translation.zh: 无法得到永久居留权

translation.en: This is your way of saying thank you to us.
translation.zh: 这是你向我们表示感谢的方式

translation.en: Please reconsider, and I hope to hear back from you. Thank you.
translation.zh: 请重新考虑我希望收到你的回复 谢谢

translation.en: [Renata in Portuguese] It is inhumane to get halfway and be stopped
translation.zh: 半途而废并被一个希望人民

translation.en: by a fascist government that wants their people to die.
translation.zh: 去死的法西斯政府阻止是不人道的

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Cousins.
translation.zh: 表亲

translation.en: It's early.
translation.zh: 现在还早

translation.en: "Shamed by this hospital…"
translation.zh: “被这家医院羞辱了…”

translation.en: Shamed? Why did they write that?
translation.zh: 羞辱了？他们为什么那样写？

translation.en: Because yesterday, when I did a letter to Boris Johnson,
translation.zh: 因为昨天 我给鲍里斯约翰逊写信时

translation.en: they changed the rules.
translation.zh: 他们改变了规则

translation.en: [Gimba] "Refugee wins right for his family to remain if he dies on the front line."
translation.zh: “难民为家人赢得他死在前线后得以居留的权利”

translation.en: It was viewed five million times.
translation.zh: 它被观看了五百万次

translation.en: And shared tens of thousands of times, and--
translation.zh: 并被分享了数万次

translation.en: And after four hours of putting it out, the government U-turned.
translation.zh: 在推出四个小时后 政府掉头了

translation.en: They announced that they are including everyone in the bereavement scheme.
translation.zh: 他们宣布会将每个人都包括在丧亲计划中

translation.en: The cleaning job is not
translation.zh: 清洁工作不是

translation.en: part of the job you are doing, it's a temporary job for you.
translation.zh: 你正在做的工作的一部分对你来说是临时工作

translation.en: -But for me, it's my life. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -但对我来说 是我的生命-是的

translation.en: It's my job, I'm doing it all the time.
translation.zh: 它是我的工作 我一直都在这样做

translation.en: But I appreciate… I very appreciate the way you've done it.
translation.zh: 但我很感激…我很感激你成功做到的方式

translation.en: -I'm gonna do this. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我要这样做-是

translation.en: -I know, because we can't-- [laughs] -We cannot hug.
translation.zh: -我知道 因为我们不能…-我们不能拥抱

translation.en: But hopefully…
translation.zh: 但希望…

translation.en: [female reporter in Portuguese] Protests happening in at least 140 American cities
translation.zh: 美国至少140个城市发生抗议活动

translation.en: after the death of an unarmed Black man in police custody.
translation.zh: 随着一名手无寸铁的黑人被警察拘留后死亡而展开

translation.en: [Renata] Only Black people know how difficult it is
translation.zh: 只有黑人了解必须每天

translation.en: to have to prove yourself to people every day.
translation.zh: 向人们证明自己有多痛苦

translation.en: You have to prove that you are good, prove that you are a lawful person,
translation.zh: 你要证明你是好人证明你是个守法的人

translation.en: prove that you are clean, that your hair is clean,
translation.zh: 证明你是清白的 你的头发是干净的

translation.en: that you bought your own clothes,
translation.zh: 你穿自己买的衣服

translation.en: and if you have a nice phone that you paid for it.
translation.zh: 如果你有个好电话 也是你付钱买的

translation.en: And… "I can't breathe" needs to give way to
translation.zh: 还有…“我不能呼吸”必须让位给

translation.en: "I am here and I am breathing."
translation.zh: “我在这里 我在呼吸”

translation.en: -[all] Say their names! -Dante Parker!
translation.zh: -说出他们的名字！-但丁帕克！

translation.en: Say my son's name! Marcus Brown!
translation.zh: 说我儿子的名字！马库斯布朗！

translation.en: We're fighting for humanity right now.
translation.zh: 现在我们正为人道而战

translation.en: We're asking everyone all over the world to stand with us and fight with us.
translation.zh: 我们恳求全世界的每一个人与我们站在同一阵线 并肩作战

translation.en: [woman] We're standing together as human beings
translation.zh: （敬请原谅我们正在努力改变世界） 人类应该团结一致 使全人类更繁荣

translation.en: for all of humanity to thrive.
translation.zh: 人类应该团结一致 使全人类更繁荣

translation.en: We need changes, big changes.
translation.zh: 我们需要改变 大改变

translation.en: We want justice for everyone, in Kenya, or all over the world.
translation.zh: 我们要为每个人伸张正义无论是在肯尼亚 或世界各地

translation.en: Is this justice?
translation.zh: 这是正义吗？

translation.en: [all] No justice, no peace! No justice, no peace!
translation.zh: 没有正义 就没有和平！

translation.en: [in Portuguese] We are few of the many who will rise.
translation.zh: 在众多将要崛起的人中 我们是少数

translation.en: -[in English] Keep going! -Keep going!
translation.zh: -继续前进！-继续前进！

translation.en: We are rising up, telling the whole world that enough is enough.
translation.zh: 我们要告诉全世界 要适可而止

translation.en: We are united!
translation.zh: 我们是团结的！

translation.en: [all] We are united! We are united!
translation.zh: 我们是团结的！

translation.en: [female reporter] In a landmark moment in the fight against the coronavirus pandemic,
translation.zh: 在抗击冠状病毒疫情一个具有里程碑意义的时刻

translation.en: the UK medicines regulator has approved the coronavirus vaccine
translation.zh: 英国药品监管机构已批准了

translation.en: developed by AstraZeneca and scientists at Oxford University.
translation.zh: 由阿斯利康和牛津大学科学家开发的冠状病毒疫苗

translation.en: -Hello. -Hello.
translation.zh: -你好-你好

translation.en: [man] There has been a huge amount of excitement globally about a vaccine.
translation.zh: 人们对疫苗感到非常兴奋

translation.en: It's the only thing that's likely to get us out of this.
translation.zh: 这是唯一能让我们摆脱困境的方法

translation.en: We've known that since the beginning.
translation.zh: 我们从一开始就知道

translation.en: [woman] Is it a jump-up-and-down moment? Is it a punch the air moment?
translation.zh: 这是个喜悦的时刻吗？成功的时刻？

translation.en: Not really, no. [laughs] It was more of a relief.
translation.zh: 也不算是 这更像是一种解脱

translation.en: It's not the end of this process.
translation.zh: 这不是这个过程的结局

translation.en: The thing to focus on is that there are three vaccines now
translation.zh: 主要关注的是有三种疫苗

translation.en: that have demonstrated really high efficacy, and this is great news.
translation.zh: 已证明有效 这是个好消息

translation.en: We need probably more than three vaccines if we're going to protect the whole world.
translation.zh: 如果我们要保护全世界就需要三种以上的疫苗

translation.en: Could it, arguably, be the vaccine that will make more of a difference globally
translation.zh: 与我们迄今为止看到的其他疫苗相比

translation.en: than the other ones we've seen so far?
translation.zh: 这疫苗是否会在全球产生更大影响？

translation.en: This is not the most expensive vaccine to manufacture, by a long way,
translation.zh: 这不是制造成本最高的疫苗

translation.en: and also be able to deploy it without having to store it frozen.
translation.zh: 而且还能无需冷冻储存来部署它

translation.en: That means it can feed into existing vaccine supply distribution networks--
translation.zh: 这表示它能加入现有的疫苗供应分配网络

translation.en: [Prof. Gilbert] What I'd like to happen after this
translation.zh: 我希望接下来

translation.en: is the recognition of the fact that this approach works.
translation.zh: 事实可以证明这种方法有效

translation.en: We can do it much more quickly than we've done it in the past,
translation.zh: 我们可以比过去做得更快

translation.en: and it doesn't have to be hugely expensive either.
translation.zh: 而且也不一定更昂贵

translation.en: And I would like to be able to apply that to solve a lot of other problems.
translation.zh: 我希望能用它解决很多其他问题

translation.en: My confidence in the science remains strong,
translation.zh: 我对科学的信心依然坚定

translation.en: even though this pandemic has shown having the right science
translation.zh: 尽管这次疫情已证明拥有正确的科学

translation.en: is only one part of the solution to any public health crisis.
translation.zh: 只是解决任何公共健康危机的一部分

translation.en: [Dr. Tedros] For me, COVID-19 is a call, a clear call.
translation.zh: 对我来说 新冠肺炎是一个唤醒一个明确的唤醒

translation.en: A call that is telling us to really behave.
translation.zh: 唤醒我们要举止得当

translation.en: To behave as a global community.
translation.zh: 表现为一个全球性的社区

translation.en: COVID-19 has taken so much from us,
translation.zh: 新冠肺炎从夺走了我们很多东西

translation.en: but it's also giving us an opportunity to break with the past
translation.zh: 但这也给了我们一个机会与过去决裂

translation.en: and build back better.
translation.zh: 并更好地重建

translation.en: I want us to see this as opportunity.
translation.zh: 我希望我们将此视为机会

translation.en: It's a crisis.
translation.zh: 这是一场危机

translation.en: But opportunities are born from crises.
translation.zh: 但机会是从危机中诞生的

translation.en: [in Farsi] Take that side.
translation.zh: 就拿那一边

translation.en: Look how nice this looks now.
translation.zh: 看看现在看起来多好

translation.en: It needs guests.
translation.zh: 它需要客人

translation.en: It's calling for guests.
translation.zh: 它在呼唤客人们

translation.en: [in Hindi] You okay? No?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？不好？

translation.en: I am afraid.
translation.zh: 我很害怕

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -[panting] Give me your hand.
translation.zh: 把你的手给我

translation.en: [Nupur] My unborn little angel.
translation.zh: 我未出生的小天使

translation.en: I'm writing this letter to you,
translation.zh: 我正在给你写信

translation.en: a week before you will arrive into this beautiful and broken world.
translation.zh: 在你将抵达这个美丽却破碎的世界的前一周

translation.en: [Nupur] Get me out of here.
translation.zh: 带我离开这里

translation.en: [Nupur] I wonder if you can hear me now.
translation.zh: 不知道你现在是否能听到我的声音

translation.en: I know that this journey was a difficult one for you.
translation.zh: 我知道这段旅程对你来说很困难

translation.en: [man] Now he'll give you a small injection to make your lower body numb.
translation.zh: 现在他会给你打一个小针让你的下半身麻木

translation.en: [Nupur] Some days, I am so scared.
translation.zh: 有些时候 我非常害怕

translation.en: Scared that we are not good enough,
translation.zh: 害怕我们不够好

translation.en: and scared that maybe it's unfair
translation.zh: 害怕也许把你带来一个

translation.en: to bring you into a place with so much suffering.
translation.zh: 那么多痛苦的地方是不公平的

translation.en: [woman] It's a little baby boy!
translation.zh: 是个小男婴！

translation.en: Here you are.
translation.zh: 给你

translation.en: [Nupur] One day, when you are older,
translation.zh: 有一天 当你年纪大了

translation.en: your father and I will be able to tell you about the world you were born into.
translation.zh: 你父亲和我可以告诉你关于你出生的世界

translation.en: Your birth is a true ray of hope.
translation.zh: 你的诞生是真正的希望之光

translation.en: You have a chance to help rebuild the world
translation.zh: 你有机会帮助重建世界

translation.en: with love and compassion.
translation.zh: 怀着爱和慈悲

translation.en: [man in Spanish] Good morning. How are you doing, sir?
translation.zh: 早安 你好吗 先生？

translation.en: We're doctors. Thanks, you're very kind.
translation.zh: 我们是医生 谢谢 你真善良

translation.en: -Don't worry. -How could I not?
translation.zh: -别担心-我怎么能不呢？

translation.en: How are you, my darlings?
translation.zh: 你好吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: Better, but I'm tired.
translation.zh: 比较好了 但很累

translation.en: [woman] Several colleagues have relapsed.
translation.zh: 几个同事又复发了

translation.en: They got better, relapsed, and now they're hospitalized.
translation.zh: 他们好转了又复发 现在他们住院了

translation.en: [Dr. Lopez] I thought I was going to go back to work today.
translation.zh: 我以为今天要回去工作了

translation.en: But it's not so simple, because I've had pneumonia.
translation.zh: 但事情没那么简单 因为我得了肺炎

translation.en: Is that my ICU list or is it someone else's?
translation.zh: 那是我的重症监护室名单还是别人的？

translation.en: [woman] You were sorely missed in the ICU.
translation.zh: 重症监护室的人都很想念你

translation.en: You're the only one who knows how to organize things.
translation.zh: 你是唯一知道如何组织事情的人

translation.en: Your husband also had it?
translation.zh: 你丈夫也染上了？

translation.en: [Dr. Lopez] I infected him. Well, not really.
translation.zh: 我传染给他 其实也不算

translation.en: We got infected by our housekeeper.
translation.zh: 我们被管家传染了

translation.en: You can imagine everything that went through my head.
translation.zh: 你可以想象我脑海中闪过的一切

translation.en: Being in charge of the ICU and everything else.
translation.zh: 负责重症监护室和其他的

translation.en: I questioned the example I would be setting my staff.
translation.zh: 我质疑会给我的下属做不好的榜样

translation.en: Everything I thought about.
translation.zh: 我想到的一切

translation.en: To get infected at home!
translation.zh: 然后在家被传染！

translation.en: But it's over.
translation.zh: 当都过去了

translation.en: Goodbye, girls, thank you.
translation.zh: 再见 女士们 谢谢你

translation.en: [Renata in Portuguese] Since we buried my mother,
translation.zh: 自从我们埋葬了我母亲

translation.en: I've avoided coming back to this place for as long as possible.
translation.zh: 我尽量避免回到这个地方

translation.en: It's here.
translation.zh: 就在这里

translation.en: Cherry quarter, sector 15.
translation.zh: 樱桃区 第15区

translation.en: My brother and my mother are just a number now.
translation.zh: 我哥哥和妈妈现在只是一个数字

translation.en: This plaque has my brother's name.
translation.zh: 这块牌匾上有我哥哥的名字

translation.en: We still need to do a plaque with my mom's name.
translation.zh: 我们还需要做一块写着我妈妈名字的牌匾

translation.en: Their new home.
translation.zh: 他们的新家

translation.en: Both my mother and Rogério…
translation.zh: 我妈妈和罗杰里奥

translation.en: When I fucked up, he was the guy who'd say,
translation.zh: 当我搞砸时 他就是那个会说：

translation.en: "It's done. Now keep going. Don't look back. Keep walking."
translation.zh: “过去了 现在继续往前看不要回头 继续走”

translation.en: And my mom, when I fucked up, she'd look at me and say,
translation.zh: 还有我妈妈 我搞砸时她会看着我说：

translation.en: "I can't believe it, but I'm here for you."
translation.zh: “我无法相信 但我会支持你的”

translation.en: This made me who I am today.
translation.zh: 这造就了今天的我

translation.en: I leave here in peace…
translation.zh: 我平静地离开这里

translation.en: with the certainty that I'm doing things right.
translation.zh: 确信我在做正确的事情

translation.en: It is nothing different from what you would want me to do.
translation.zh: 这和你对我的期待没什么不同

translation.en: [Mohammad in Farsi] What a beautiful bird!
translation.zh: -好美的鸟！-哦 好可爱！

translation.en: [Sara] Oh, so lovely! So pretty, my dear!
translation.zh: -好美的鸟！-哦 好可爱！ 真美 亲爱的！

translation.en: [Mohammad] She flew down so softly like this.
translation.zh: 她就这样轻轻地飞了下来

translation.en: When we're little,
translation.zh: 我们小时候

translation.en: everything is so magical for us.
translation.zh: 一切对我们来说都是那么神奇

translation.en: I'd like us all to…
translation.zh: 我希望我们

translation.en: rediscover wonder in the ordinary again.
translation.zh: 再次在平凡中重新发现奇迹

translation.en: Like feeling the touch
translation.zh: 例如感受

translation.en: of our parents' hands.
translation.zh: 触摸我们父母双手的感觉

translation.en: Embracing them.
translation.zh: 拥抱他们

translation.en: If I could hug someone I love again.
translation.zh: 如果我能再次拥抱我爱的人

translation.en: [in English] So, I'm going to drive you home. But…
translation.zh: 我会送你回家 但是…

translation.en: -But what? -But, we gotta--
translation.zh: -但是什么？-但是 我们…

translation.en: We're gonna take a quick detour. There's something I want to show you.
translation.zh: 会快速绕道 我想给你看一个东西

translation.en: It won't take long, I promise.
translation.zh: 不会太久 我答应你

translation.en: -So, I brought you all the way here-- -Yeah?
translation.zh: -我一路带你到这里…-是？

translation.en: Because I wanted to show you this.
translation.zh: …因为我想让你看这个

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, fuckin' Lord.
translation.zh: 天啊 我的天

translation.en: -What? -[laughing]
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -Ah! -Gimba.
translation.zh: 金巴

translation.en: Can you believe that?
translation.zh: 你能相信吗？

translation.en: Oh, my-- I can't believe this. Don't make me cry now.
translation.zh: 天啊…我不敢相信 别害我哭了

translation.en: -I wish I could hug you. -I know.
translation.zh: -真希望可以拥抱你-我知道

translation.en: "Gimba, the ward host."
translation.zh: “金巴 病房服务员”

translation.en: [Sara in Farsi] This virus, it has tested us.
translation.zh: 这个病毒 它考验了我们

translation.en: It's changed us all.
translation.zh: 它改变了我们所有人

translation.en: [Mohammad] My dear, you know, when this year began,
translation.zh: 亲爱的 今年开始时

translation.en: I thought it would be the year
translation.zh: 我以为今年

translation.en: I got all the things I wanted.
translation.zh: 是我实现梦想的一年

translation.en: Now I know it's the year I appreciate everything I already have.
translation.zh: 现在我知道今年是珍惜所有的一年

translation.en: [in English] We're gonna hear from people we serve at the shower site.
translation.zh: 我们请我们在淋浴间服务的人说话

translation.en: They want to say a couple words.
translation.zh: 他们有些话要说

translation.en: I got more love inside this gate than I got out there in Overtown.
translation.zh: 我在这里得到的爱比在欧弗敦时得到的更多

translation.en: I see the light at the end of the tunnel now.
translation.zh: 现在我看到了隧道尽头的曙光

translation.en: [Dr. Henderson] We try to dream about a society in which we live in
translation.zh: 我们试图梦想我们生活的社区

translation.en: that is devoid of all these disparities and imagining things like that,
translation.zh: 没有这些差异及想象那样的事情

translation.en: it helps me to be the type of physician I am today.
translation.zh: 它帮助我成为今天的我这样的医生

translation.en: We need more people like Dr. Armen Henderson.
translation.zh: 我们需要更多像阿门亨德森医生这样的人

translation.en: [Dr. Henderson] Thank you, Bishop. I appreciate that.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 主教 非常感谢

translation.en: I wanna say thank you to all volunteers that've been with us.
translation.zh: 我想对志愿者说声谢谢

translation.en: And we do this out of love,
translation.zh: 我们是因为爱而做

translation.en: and the volunteers show that love. It's not charity, it's solidarity.
translation.zh: 志愿者表现出这种爱这不是慈善 而是团结

translation.en: -You still gotta go to work tonight! -I gotta work tonight.
translation.zh: -今晚你还得上班！-今晚我要上班

translation.en: Y'all, make some noise for Armen, please!
translation.zh: 大家给阿门来点掌声！

translation.en: -[all cheer] -Yes!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: [Dr. Henderson] And knowing that we're fighting for something
translation.zh: 知道自己为一些可能看不到变化的

translation.en: that we may not see the changes, is part of tradition.
translation.zh: 东西而战 是传统的一部分

translation.en: [in Spanish] Good morning.
translation.zh: 早安

translation.en: Hello, Aldair! How are you doing?
translation.zh: 你好 奥尔代尔！你感觉如何？

translation.en: Better? Are you able to eat now?
translation.zh: 好点了？现在你可以吃东西了吗？

translation.en: Yes? Has your mom seen you?
translation.zh: 是吗？你妈妈看见你了吗？

translation.en: I think you can allow his mom to come and see him.
translation.zh: 我想你可以让他妈妈来看他

translation.en: Because we can take him outside.
translation.zh: 因为我们可以让他到外面去

translation.en: -He's not infectious anymore. -I'll let her know.
translation.zh: -他已经没有传染性了-我会通知她

translation.en: Coordinate with her. Yeah? Okay?
translation.zh: 和她协调 好吗？

translation.en: You'll be leaving soon, won't you?
translation.zh: 你很快就要走了 是吗？

translation.en: Like this.
translation.zh: 像这样

translation.en: Well done. Good.
translation.zh: 做得好 很好

translation.en: Take him for a stroll.
translation.zh: 带他去逛逛

translation.en: Hi, it's Dad. I'm working.
translation.zh: 嗨 是爸爸 我在工作

translation.en: I've got your things, I'll bring them over.
translation.zh: 我拿了你的东西 我会带过去给你

translation.en: [nurse] He'll come at 7:00 p.m.
translation.zh: 他会在傍晚7点过来

translation.en: [Aldair's father] I'm so excited.
translation.zh: 我很兴奋

translation.en: As a father, I saw him being born.
translation.zh: 身为父亲 我看着他出生

translation.en: My son!
translation.zh: 我的儿子！

translation.en: How are you, darling?
translation.zh: 你好吗 亲爱的？

translation.en: My child, how are you doing, my son? You're looking better already.
translation.zh: 我的孩子 你感觉如何 我的儿子？你看起来已经好多了

translation.en: Stay calm, my boy. You'll quickly recover from this.
translation.zh: 冷静点 我的孩子你会很快从中恢复过来

translation.en: Your mom, she's so happy.
translation.zh: 你的妈妈非常高兴

translation.en: She's been praying for you,
translation.zh: 她一直为你

translation.en: and your little brother, Mateo.

translation.en: Stay calm.
translation.zh: 冷静点

translation.en: My child, I want a kiss.
translation.zh: 我的孩子 我非常爱你

translation.en: -[Aldair cries] -It's okay, my son. I love you so much.
translation.zh: 没事了 我的儿子 我非常爱你

translation.en: Stay calm, my son. I've brought your things here.
translation.zh: 冷静点 我的儿子我把你的东西带来了

translation.en: [Dr. Lopez] It's gratifying to see people survive.
translation.zh: 看到人们幸存下来 真的很高兴

translation.en: [crying] I've treated my patients kindly
translation.zh: 我善待我的病人

translation.en: because I hope that someone would do the same
translation.zh: 因为我希望我女儿或父母需要帮助时

translation.en: if my daughter or parents needed help.
translation.zh: 有人也会同样对待他们

translation.en: I don't want any commendations.

translation.en: I want a better health system.
translation.zh: 我要一个更完善的医疗系统

translation.en: I want staff who have the determination to wear a white coat,
translation.zh: 我要有决心穿白大褂的员工

translation.en: to know that this was our war, our battlefield.
translation.zh: 知道这是我们的战争 我们的战场

translation.en: We were destined to be here.
translation.zh: 我们注定要在这里

translation.en: That's all. [sniffs]
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: [in English] All right. Let's cross the street.
translation.zh: 好 我们过马路吧

translation.en: Luna!
translation.zh: 露娜！

translation.en: [Dr. Henderson] I want to build a world in which I know my children are gonna thrive,
translation.zh: 我想建立一个我知道我的孩子会茁壮成长

translation.en: in which other children are gonna thrive.
translation.zh: 其他孩子也会茁壮成长的世界

translation.en: I need you to be up in front of me, okay?
translation.zh: 我要你在我前面 知道吗？

translation.en: -I want to make sure I see you. -Okay.
translation.zh: -我要确保我看见你-好的

translation.en: Keep walking. Yep.
translation.zh: 继续走 对

translation.en: [Dr. Henderson] We're gonna keep fighting and continue to do what we have to do.
translation.zh: 我们将继续战斗继续做我们该做的事

translation.en: -I'm going. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 我要走了

translation.en: You don't have to carry her. Put her down. It's a dog.
translation.zh: 不需要抱她 把它放下 它是只狗

translation.en: She's tired.
translation.zh: 它累了

translation.en: [in Portuguese] Life goes on, we keep going.
translation.zh: 生活还要继续 我们要继续

translation.en: We keep doing what we do best. We keep standing.
translation.zh: 我们继续做我们最擅长的事情我们持守岗位

translation.en: [Dr. Tedros in English] The world is so small.
translation.zh: 这世界很小

translation.en: It's our common action that can bring a better of the world we live.
translation.zh: 我们共同的行动可以让我们生活的世界变得更美好

translation.en: Our choice should be convergence.
translation.zh: 我们的选择应该是趋同

translation.en: So, are we ready?
translation.zh: 那么 我们准备好了吗？
